elements.title: Electricity generation charts by Ofgemn
elements.description: Ofgem data portal for the energy markets in Great Britain. This portal gives direct access to all of our interactive data charts in a single location, alongside indicators we consider key to our performance monitoring.

elements.title: ICIS - Energy
elements.description: global source of Independent Commodity Intelligence Services - ICIS connect data, markets and customers to create a comprehensive, trusted view of the global commodities markets, enabling smarter business decisions that optimise the worldâ€™s resources.

elements.title: National Statistics Energy Trends: UK electricity
elements.description: Data on electricity generation, supply, consumption and fuel use for generation.

elements.title: Nord Pool
elements.description: Nord Pool runs the leading power market in Europe, and we offer day-ahead and intraday markets to our customers. The day-ahead market is the main arena for trading power, and the intraday market supplements the day-ahead market and helps secure balance between supply and demand. Historical datasets are available on their website.

elements.title: EPEX spot
elements.description: EPEX SPOT is the leading exchange for the power spot markets at the heart of Europe. It covers Germany, France, United Kingdom, the Netherlands, Belgium, Austria, Switzerland and Luxembourg

elements.title: ICE pricing and analytics
elements.description: Intercontinental Exchange builds, operates and advances global markets through information, technology and expertise. The leading pricing, analytics and market data offered through ICE Data Services support mission-critical processes across the front, middle and back offices of organizations around the world.
